author: max-zhao0
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of [45605](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45605) for use on online release.

#### PR validation:

Validated locally on CMSSW_14_0_12, running DQM/Integration/python/clients/l1tstage2_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py modified for testing on lxplus. Validated also with online DQM playback test.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of [45605](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45605). Backporting is necessary for running on online release.
title: [14_0] Add L1TCaloLayer1Summary and necessary changes to emulator
